text: Ne (betsulisie ) olwa waboolela ulia wa Nyasaye yakholela obulayi nawe wesi nomukholela obulayi, mbu: “ Tilana nende Omukhasi wuwo ne orie Nyasaye (olamulekha tawe)” Ne nofisa mushilifu shishio aka Nyasaye yenya okhurusia, ne noria amakhuwa kabandu, ne Nyasaye niye ukhoyeshele muno okhuriibwa. Kho Zaid olwa yamalana nomukhasi oyo, khwa khubashila ewe kho bulaba obutinyu khubasuubili okhuteshia abakhasi ba Abana babu bokhulela olwabalaba nibalabenya tawe, Ne lilako lia Nyasaye niliokhukholwa
